value: [Music]
although I know there is a small chance
you will actually watch this video I
feel compelled to share this open letter
with you I like many others have been
your most adamant supporters since the
time you announced your intention to run
for the office of the presidency of the
United States since that time I as well
as many others have vehemently supported
your administration's incredible effort
to bring safety security and prosperity
back to a nation that had been destroyed
from within the Destroyers were lying
politicians fake news reporters fascist
protesters and many corrupt corporate
leaders just to name a few we defeated
them in 2016 we rejected their false
song of globalism and we elected a
champion of the people but today that's
all coming under attack
once again
our movement began with the simple
phrase make America great again a phrase
that embodied the overwhelmingly
daunting task of reestablishing a
country that has been responsible for so
many great ideals and achievements our
founding fathers built a system of
governance by the people and for the
people they fought bled and died to
ensure that future generations would
enjoy the same freedoms which were
inherently promised to us by our Creator
those freedoms are under attack in case
you were not aware our country has been
lulled into a state of unmitigated
complacency the incredible advancement
of technology in the Internet has
created a new domain in which an
unbelievable amount of power and control
has fallen into the hands of a very
small group of extremely diabolical and
dishonest political and corporate
entities as of this letter the remain
countless examples of how these
monolithic corporations have started
using their immense power coupled with
their vast legal immunities to begin the
wholesale removal of lead the American
people's constitutionally guaranteed
right to free speech without
unreasonable discrimination
just as a civil rights movement sought
to remedy a broken system which
institutionalized racism and bigotry so
too are we in desperate need of a
movement champion by a leader who will
recognize the injustice of our modern
big tech tyranny our society is composed
of a multitude of different thoughts and
ideas these thoughts and ideas are of
paramount importance when one examines
the innate foundational base of our free
and open society which is a beacon of
hope around the world unfortunately
there are those among us who do not
believe our basic freedoms matter there
are those among us who prefer oppression
over expression there are those among us
who prefer silence over debate and there
are those among us who prefer servitude
over freedom I am writing you this
letter as an open plea for help over the
span of history our nation has endured
wars famines epidemics natural disasters
and a Great Depression just to name a
few things but we have persevered and
overcome these great challenges by
coming together and reinforcing the idea
that America is an exceptional nation
with exceptional people today our new
adversity presents itself in the form of
authoritarian censorship after decades
of empty promises and disingenuous
platitudes the elites of Silicon Valley
have finally revealed their true intent
by initiating the most draconian an
Orwellian push towards centralized
control of thought this country has ever
seen in modern times Facebook Twitter
YouTube and Google have used their
unassuming corporate facades to not only
become the largest and most powerful
corporations in the world but they have
also managed to make themselves
ubiquitous as the only game in town
worth playing
our nation's political discourse as well
as nearly all other discourse has now
crossed into the digital age
newspapers radios and TVs are now fading
into the realm of antiquity only to be
rapidly replaced by the ever-growing use
and dependence on the Internet via
computer smartphone and tablet with this
migration the big tech companies have
gained veritable monopolies over digital
information in the span of only a couple
of decades this transition and
subsequent result has profoundly changed
the landscape for free speech in this
country today these companies who
proclaimed to be open speech platforms
without bias have instead become a new
elite ruling class who digitally
subjugates
the American people by denying access to
the virtual public square
they have institutionally implemented
protocols which undermine
constitutionally guaranteed civil
liberties by effectively shadow banning
to boosting and deep platforming anyone
who will not agree to use the speech
which they deem acceptable this is an
egregious violation of our civil rights
people are being banned from these
supposed open speech platforms simply
because someone somewhere is offended by
what someone else has to say if we are
going to uphold the tenets and
principles outlined in the US
Constitution and Bill of Rights we must
address this issue now before the same
big tech oligarchs start to intervene in
our political system more by using their
absurdly massive reach and control to
affect their own desired outcomes and
subvert the will of the American people
I am asking the president and the US
Congress to stand against this digital
dictatorship by revoking the legal
immunities provided by section 230 of
the Communications Decency Act for any
corporation found to be in direct
violation of this agreement also I am
calling on the President to work with
Congress to legislate and pass new
protections for the Civil Liberties of
digitally active citizens
the United States in the words of
President Trump quote our movement is
about replacing a failed and corrupt
political establishment with a new
government controlled by we the American
people the Washington establishment and
the financial and media corporations
that funded exist for only one reason to
protect and enrich themselves and for
these institutions must abide by the
Constitution and they must be held
accountable thank you and God bless the
United States of America thanks for
watching this episode of just informed
talk you guys want to do me a favor go
and tweet this at the president let's
see if we can get his attention thanks
guys
[Music]
